structure.unit: Courts, Judicial Officers And Proceedings In Civil Cases

law.catch_line: Confidentiality Of Domestic Violence Victims’ Program And Rape Crisis Center Locations
law.text: The location and street address of all domestic violence victims’ programs, as defined in section twenty K and rape crisis centers, as defined in section twenty J, shall be absolutely confidential and shall not be required to be revealed in any criminal or civil proceeding.
